desc: Labre's Hope strive to end homelessness through employment in ethically made sustainable cosmetics. We provide jobs to people experiencing homelessness using soap as vehicle for positive change in our community. Supporting us by purchasing our luxury soap not only provides work it benefits our employees mental health.

layout.text: Ethically Made, 100% Natural, Vegan, Hand-Crafted Cosmetics To Help People Escape Homelessness.
When you buy our products, you are helping support homeless people into employment.
